name: Tahini (Sesame Seed Butter)
properties: Use in moderation for weight loss
Better as whole seeds for structure
benefits: Tahini is made from ground sesame seeds and provides healthy fats, calcium, and minerals. While not unhealthy, for weight-loss acceleration, structurally intact sesame seeds would be better as the grinding releases calories from cell walls. Use tahini in small amounts for flavor in dressings and sauces.
amount: 2-3 tablespoons for dressings serving 4 people. Use sparingly for weight loss

quotes: This is not to say something like almond butter or tahini is unhealthy by any stretch, but for weight-loss acceleration, structurally intact nuts and seeds would be better.
